config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'keepUnoptimizedFilesPostProcessor' is a boolean option that determines whether to keep unoptimized files after processing. It is used to set the value of the 'cbKeepUnoptimized' checkbox in the loadPrefs() method.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the loadPrefs() method is called, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user accesses the settings related to file processing.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'keepUnoptimizedFilesPostProcessor' configuration option is that it affects the storage space used by the application. If set to true, it will result in the application keeping unoptimized files, which may consume more storage space. If set to false, it will delete unoptimized files after processing, saving storage space.
